title: The International Bad Boys Hour Ep 62: Roasted With Dan Nolan
description: The International Bad Boys Hour is back and off to a weird start.  Sam is so jacked on caffeine that he starts the show with Steve.  Steve says it cool but is it?  Sam talks about his new residency at the Sin City Theatre live inside Planet Hollywood in Las Vegas.   The boys then welcome Roast Writer Dan Nolan to the show.  Dan talks about being junkie, losing all of him money gambling and what it's like to be banging a chick and realizing she's a Neo Nazi!  Please check out Thenaughtyshowlv.com for more details on Sam's awesome new show in Vegas!  Come get weird man!
